text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Draw guidelines for the Bulbasaur’s body. Add the head. Draw a line, which will act as the center of the head.
Draw the shape of the Bulbasaur’s body. Add a guideline for the tail.
Define with light guidelines the places for the legs, mouth and eyes.
Add the Bulbasaur’s legs, eyes and ears.
Add claws. Detail the eyes. Draw a green plant bulb on the back.
Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour the Bulbasaur, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail and add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
